stories.title: Irishman faces 20 years in jail after exposing himself on flight to New York

stories.text:
Over the last year, we built Padka.com from the ground up.

We have developed: A virtual camera for video meeting platforms like Zoom, which can add layers of photos, animation, and videos directly in the streaming video. The product is ready for macOS (you can download directly from our website - test it out) and in Beta for Windows.

Now due to some personal reasons, we can not continue... We will be so happy if some of you guys can find applications and will continue building this great product that we believe so much in. Of course, you will get all the technical help that we can give you.

All of these can be exchanged for equity or the return on our investment. Any other advice on these please feel free to email me (in About section). Thanks so much for reading :)
stories.title: Ask HN: Any advice in returning investment? We believe we have a good product
Love jihad: India's lethal religious conspiracy theory
Urban Agriculture Can Improve Food Security in US Cities

stories.text:
Hi everyone, a friend’s ecommerce store has had its facebook page unpublished for violating guidelines against sexual content. They sell furniture though, and those images are being flagged for some reason. They haven’t been able to run ads the last few weeks and there is no way to appeal the decision through the app.

Does anyone have ideas on how one might try to rectify this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Appeal Facebook's unpublishing my account
Novel flight style and light wings boost flight performance of tiny beetles
